column1: Political Economy of Emerging Markets MSc
column3: Faculty of Social Science & Public Policy
column5: Our Political Economy of Emerging Markets MSc offers a distinctive approach to the study of development. We focus on the political economy of emerging markets, especially national development strategies and the underlying politics and institutions that underpin such strategies. The course also covers subjects such as development theory, business and state relations and public finance management. The programme allows you to develop your own research interests on particular countries and regions.Visit our online hubs for content, news and events about the Department of International Development
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
